广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐图表，新闻，照片和视频星期五，2025年3月7日00:06:13 +0000 En-us小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.5.5 200641670 庆祝泰特·麦克雷（Tate McRae），席琳·迪恩（Celine Dion）和更多在Billboard 200上排名第一|广告牌新闻https://www.billboard.com/video/tate-mcrae-canadian-women-number-number-one-billboard-200-billboard-news/Katie Cao Fri, 07 Mar 2025 00:06:12 +0000 MediaVideosbbnewsBillboardbillboard newsgenre pop https://www.billboard.com/?post_type=pmc_top_video&p=1235917300 Tate McRae’s ‘So Close To What’ leads at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 this week, and we’re breaking down all of the Canadian women who have gotten to No. 1 with their albums. Which album is your favorite from a Canadian woman? Let us know in the comments below! Tate McRae: This is my […]

泰特·麦克雷（Tate McRae）本周在Billboard 200上排名第一的“如此接近的事物”，我们正在分解所有加拿大女性，他们的专辑排名第一。

您最喜欢的是加拿大女性的哪一张专辑？在下面的评论中让我们知道！

泰特·麦克雷：

这是我的时间。

俄罗斯方块凯利：

泰特·麦克雷（Tate McRae）刚刚在Billboard 200上抢到了她的第一张专辑，“如此接近什么”，也成为2020年代首位领导名单的加拿大女性。但是，加拿大妇女还领导榜单？我们正在花这个妇女的历史月来分解它。 '4+4' - 泰特·麦克雷（Tate McRae）吃了那个，她坐在我们身边聊了聊她的新专辑。

泰特·麦克雷：

第一次感觉像个女人，第一次感觉到性爱，就像人们真的没有收到我的作品。

俄罗斯方块凯利：

但是她跟随许多其他加拿大皇后的脚步。在北部到峰会上的另外五名妇女中，席琳·迪翁（Celine Dion）的总数最多，总共有五人。 Alanis Morissette有三个图表，包括“锯齿状的小药丸”。来自贝尔维尔（Belleville）的艾薇儿·拉维尼（Avril Lavigne）从2004年和2007年开始有两个第一名。谁能忘记两次登顶的Shania Twain。最后，来自维多利亚州的Nelly Furtado在2006年以“ Lose”的名字榜首。有关更多广告牌新闻，请订阅我们的YouTube频道。

; 1235917300 查尔斯国王宣布苹果音乐广播节目展示“给我带来欢乐的歌曲”展示https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/king-charles-apple-music-radio-show-trailer-1235917090/Hannah Dailey Fri, 07 Mar 2025 00:01:22 +0000 MusicMusic NewsApple musicBillboard UKGlobalRadioroyals https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235917090 The program comes in celebration of this year's Commonwealth Day.

查尔斯国王（King Charles）除了英国君主（DJ）外，还扮演了新角色。

As announced Thursday (March 6), the British ruler is set to premiere a new radio show on Apple Music titled The King's Music Room .根据描述，该节目将在他在白金汉宫的个人办公室中录制，将展示查尔斯最喜欢的艺术家，从“ 1930年代的cro舞到Afrobeats Stars以及Disco Divas和Reggae Icons”。

有关的

罗比·威廉姆斯（Robbie Williams）确认他拒绝了邀请在查尔斯国王（King Charles）演出。

01/15/2025

在周四发布的预告片中，查尔斯坐在桌子后面时亲自介绍了该节目。他说：“在我的一生中，音乐对我来说意义重大。” “它具有出色的能力，可以带来幸福的回忆，在悲伤时期安慰我们，并带我们去遥远的地方。但是也许最重要的是，它可以使我们的精神提高到一定程度，而当它使我们聚集在一起以庆祝时，它就更加重要。

“换句话说，这给我们带来了欢乐，”国王继续说道。 “这是我特别想与您分享的东西：给我带来欢乐的歌曲。这似乎是庆祝今年英联邦日的一种有趣而创新的方式。”

新闻稿补充说，查尔斯的节目将“由他来自世界各地的非凡经历塑造”，并发现君主分享有关他所展示的艺术家的个人故事。鲍勃·马利（Bob Marley），凯莉·米洛（Kylie Minogue），格蕾丝·琼斯（Grace Jones），戴维（Davido）和雷（Raye）构成了他将要突出的一些音乐家。

“人类的策划一直是我们独特的社论方法的关键支柱，” Apple Music的全球内容和社论负责人Rachel Newman在一份声明中说。 “ Apple Music Radio是全世界文化正在发生的地方，我们很荣幸Charles III选择与我们分享他的个人播放列表，并与世界各地的音乐迷分享他的个人播放列表。”

The King's Music Room will premiere on Apple Music 1 and Apple Music Hits at 6 am GMT on Monday (March 10), with additional broadcasts throughout the day and Tuesday (March 11).

观看下面的预告片。

Fresh off his 2024 “Quittin' Time” tour , country star Zach Bryan is hitting the road for a string of big dates this summer.

Bryan is only playing a handful of shows in the US in 2025, but the “I Remember Everything” singer is making it count, with one of them being the inaugural concert at the University of Michigan's recently-built Michigan Stadium . Bryan will also perform at Notre-Dame Stadium, with comedian Shane Gillis and Irish singer-songwriter Dermot Kennedy tapped as openers, and play a string of dates with Kings of Leon. First though, the Grammy winner is kicking off his summer by appearing at Stagecoach , where he's booked in as a headliner.

在Ticketmaster上找到门票

; 1235916269 据报道，Charli XCX在Greta Gerwig的“ Narnia”电影中出现在谈判中https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/charli-xcx-narnia-movie-greta-gerwig-1235917267/Katie Bain Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:55:21 +0000 MusicPopDancegenre dancegenre electronicMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235917267 Gerwig's cinematic take on C.S. Lewis' classic children's fantasy books is scheduled to open on Thanksgiving Day 2026.

Charli XCX created a clubland dream world with her Brat revolution, and now it seems she may be stepping further into the realm of fantasy.

As first reported by Deadline , the pop star is being considered for a role in Greta Gerwig's upcoming Narnia film, which the revered director is creating for Netflix. Deadline reports that the singer is “among top choices for a key role” but does not note which of the beloved characters this might be — though the report notes it “potentially could be Jadis, The White Witch.”

有关的

Charli XCX赢得了2025年英国大奖：全获奖者名单

03/01/2025

A representative for Charli did not immediately respond to Billboard 's request for comment.

Gerwig, who sparked a global movement of her own with her 2023 Barbie movie, is directing a take on CS Lewis' classic The Chronicles of Narnia series, with the film scheduled for released on Nov. 26 (Thanksgiving Day), 2026. The film will screen in IMAX theaters for two weeks and then be available exclusively on Netflix starting on Christmas Day.

如果Charli确实出现在电影中，那将直接符合她将精力集中在表演和电影制作上的雄心勃勃的野心。 Last December it was announced that the singer had joined the cast of the upcoming film The Gallerist , directed by Cathy Yan and starring Natalie Portman and Jenna Ortega.

XCX is also producing The Moment , a film being produced by lauded indie studio A24 and based on her own idea. The Moment also marks the first project from Charli's new production company, Studio365.

Viewers will see the pop star appear in Benito Skinner's Overcompensating series, Gregg Araki's upcoming thriller I Want Your Sex , Daniel Goldhaber's Faces of Death remake and Julia Jackman's 100 Nights of Hero graphic-novel adaptation.

; 1235917267 UFC 313直播：如何观看亚历克斯·佩雷拉（Alex Pereira https://www.billboard.com/culture/product-recommendations/ufc-313-pereira-vs-ankalaev-how-to-watch-to-watch-online-nline-nline-livestreaming-1235916957/-1235916957/Rudie Obias Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:48:31 +0000 CultureProduct Recommendationsespnhow to watchMMANOADSsportsUFC https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235916957 Watch the entire MMA event, which takes place in Sin City, including the light heavyweight title bout, live on March 8.

所有特色的产品和服务都是由编辑独立选择的。但是，广告牌可能会收到通过其零售链接下达的订单的佣金，零售商可能会为会计目的获得某些可审计数据。

The UFC returns back home to “The Entertainment Capital of the World” for UFC 313 .两名总理战斗人员是主要赛事。巴西战斗机亚历克斯·“石头”佩雷拉（12-2-0）在周六（3月8日）的冠军争夺战中，在俄罗斯的“阿利布拉托维奇”·安卡拉夫（20-1-1）中捍卫他的UFC轻量级冠军腰带。

UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev takes place at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada, with a start time of 6:30 pm ET/3:30 pm PT.预计主卡将从美国东部时间晚上10点/下午7点开始。

ESPN+上的直播UFC 313 ppv

Want to watch UFC 313 online? This event is streaming on ESPN+ with pay-per-view access, which goes for $79.99 for subscribers only.

If you're not a subscriber, you can get PPV access and an ESPN+ monthly subscription — which is $11.99 per month — for $91.98 in total, or pick up an ESPN+ annual subscription for $134.98.年度订阅捆绑包是最好的交易，因为它可以为您节省总体上30％以上，而不是每月一次。

ESPN+上的直播UFC 313 ppv

Subscribers to ESPN+ and Disney+ can livestream the early prelim and prelim portions of UFC 313 for free. In fact, the prelims card airs on the cable networks ESPNEWS, so it's streamable on Fubo , as well as Hulu + Live TV — which comes with Hulu, ESPN+ and Disney+ .

与Fubo一起观看UFC 313预赛

In addition, you can get the Disney Trio — which comes with ESPN + , Hulu and Disney+ — starting as low as $16.99 per month.

获取迪士尼三重奏

什么是Pereira和Ankalaev的罢工音乐，UFC 313

Although the UFC has yet to announce each fighter's walkout music for UFC 313 , the pair usually go out to the octagon to the same songs during their matches. Alex Pereira walks out to “Itsári” by Sepultura , while Magomed Ankalaev prefers to walk out to the Russian song, “My Nanak (Мой Нанак)” by Tamila Sagaipova .

Check out the full UFC 313 fight card below, and PPV livestream here.

Main Card, 10 pm ET/7 pm PT

  • 亚历克斯·佩雷拉（Alex Pereira）（冠军）vs. magomed ankalaev（轻量级轻量级） - 冠军争夺战，主要赛事
  • Justin Gaethje vs. Rafael Fiziev（轻量级）
  • Jalin Turner vs. Ignacio Bahamondes（轻量级）
  • Amanda Lemos vs. Iasmin Lucindo（妇女的稻草人）
  • 绿色与毛利西奥·鲁菲（轻巧）

Prelims Card, 8 pm ET/5 pm PT

  • 柯蒂斯·布莱德（Curtis Blaydes）vs.Rizvan Kuniev（重量级）
  • Joshua Van vs. Rei Tsuruya（轻量级）
  • 布鲁诺·费雷拉（Brunno Ferreira）vs.阿曼·彼得罗斯（Armen Petrosyan）（中量级）
  • 亚历克斯·莫罗诺（Alex Morono）与卡洛斯·莱尔（Carlos Leal）（中量级）

Early Prelims Card, 6:30 pm ET/3:30 pm PT

  • Mairon Santos vs. Francis Marshall（轻量级）
  • 克里斯·古蒂尔雷斯（ChrisGutiérrez）vs.约翰·卡斯塔纳（JohnCastañeda）
  • Djorden Ribeiro Dos Santos vs. Osman Diaz（中量级）

UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev is streamable on ESPN+ with PPV on Saturday, March 8, starting at 6:30 pm ET/3:30 pm PT, with the main card beginning at 10 pm ET/7 pm PT.

ESPN+上的直播UFC 313 ppv

; 1235916957 Cam'ron回应古巴链接，指控他偷了“马车”合唱团https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/camron-responds-cuban-cuban-link-horse-carriage-carriage-hook-hook-stolen-1235917093/Angel Diaz Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:47:00 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-Hopgenre hiphopMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235917093 The Harlem rapper suggested that it may have been someone else who lifted the hook.

Cam'ron has responded to former Terror Squad rapper Cuban Link alleging that Cam and Mase stole the chorus to Cam's early hit song “ Horse & Carriage .”

Cuban Link told the story of how he originally came up with the hook in a resurfaced clip of his Link & Panda Show podcast. He explained that he was riding in an elevator “kickin' rhymes' with Big Pun and Mase” and he sang an interpolation of Dezi Arnaz's song “ Cuban Cabby .”

有关的

Cam'ron指责Gervonta Davis借鉴了Jim Jones＆Juelz Santana：“您不能和...

03/03/2025

The former Terror Squad rapper then revealed that he got the idea from one of Eddie Murphy's jokes in his stand-up special Delirious .

“我有六年了。那应该是我的单曲，我要把它用作我的钩子。”他说。 “ Mase就像，'那个sh-辛苦。'我看到的接下来是带有凸轮，mase，puin的“马车”。还记得吗？那是什么钩？”

Pun was a guest feature on the song's remix alongside Charli Baltimore, Silkk the Shocker and Wyclef , so Cuban is referring to the original from Cam's debut album Confessions of Fire .

尽管卡姆最初嘲笑这个想法，但他承认，钩子有可能被抬起，因为这个想法显然来自他的旧唱片公司老板兰斯·“联合”里维拉。他说：“我不知道古巴链接在谈论什么，因为莫斯偷听了他的钩子，而Mase偷了钩子。” “不过，这就是我要告诉古巴的链接：如果您在Lance'Un'Rivera面前唱钩子，那么您可能会有一个案子，因为Un提出了这个钩子。”

“'联合国里维拉（Rivera）是一个出现的人，说他想唱着里奇·里卡多·胡克（Ricky Ricardo Hook）。他一直在唱歌 - 一直在唱歌。我们做了唱片，他就像，“打电话给你的男人”。 “ Un”实际上将他带入了钩子。因此，向古巴链接大喊。如果您曾在Lance'Un'Rivera面前唱歌，您可能会有争执。但是Mase并没有想出那个钩子。”

You can watch the full Talk With Flee episode below.

; 1235917093 Ingrid Andress获得了Elle King，Kelsea Ballerini和Carlos Santana的支持： https://www.billboard.com/music/country/ingrid-anthem-support-Artists-Artists-Artists-elle-king-king-kersea-kersea-kellerini-anthem-performance-performance-1235917162/Jessica Nicholson Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:31:00 +0000 CountryMusicgenre countryhttps://www.billboard.com/?p=1235917162 "For them to be like, 'Hey, we've all been there,' it was very meaningful," Andress says during ]>;]>;

Ingrid Andress made headlines — and garnered considerable backlash — last summer after her botched performance of the national anthem at the MLB Home Run Derby in Arlington, Texas. Andress swiftly issued an apology on social media, saying, “I'm not gonna bullsh– y'all.昨晚我喝醉了。我今天要检查自己，以获得所需的帮助。昨晚不是我。”

有关的

Ingrid Andress宣布了导致她“恐怖”国歌的原因以及她的状况如何……

03/06/2025

“比我的更多的心”杀手寻求治疗，最近在科罗拉多雪崩曲棍球比赛中演唱了国歌。

She's been making the media rounds, and during an appearance on the podcast The Viall Files , Andress opened up about the support she's received from other artists — and she noted, in particular, how other women country music artists encouraged and championed Andress during her time in rehab.

“这实际上是国歌之后发生的另一件事。我期望没有人伸出援手，”她说。 “但是，纳什维尔的女性乡村艺术家的爱情太多了。实际上，我感到如此被爱并看到康复。”

She continued, “ Elle King was like, 'This is just all part of it, girl,' and she's obviously been there before, too, and you know, Kelsea Ballerini was like, 'Welcome to the worst parts of this job.'主要是女人。 Karen Fairchild from Little Big Town , and that really meant a lot to me, because I feel like women in country music have had to stick together based on very obvious things because it's a very male-dominated genre, but for them to be like, 'Hey, we've all been there,' it was very meaningful.”

乡村音乐的女性艺术家并不是唯一与Love伸出援手的艺术家：Andress回忆起艺术家Guitar Virtuoso Carlos Santana如何在支持下伸出援手。

“我一生中从未和他说过，他问我的管理层，'嘿，我可以得到英格丽的电话吗？' …他是如此友善和支持。他就像，“如果您想做一首歌，就知道在哪里找到我，”他给了我鲜花。”

安德雷斯（Andress）最近发行了她的新歌《足迹》（Footprints），继续巩固自己的回归。

“随着我年龄的增长并经历了更多的生活，我认为地球上最人类的事情是失败的。 It's getting kicked off, feeling the sting of it, but getting back on the same d**n horse anyway,” Andress wrote in an Instagram post revealing the song. “我想成为的姐姐，女儿和人是有韧性的。没有我的生活中的错误，我将不会成为今天的人，而且我敢肯定，地狱就没有关于我的旅程的故事。我们必须谈论我们的错误，以使我们的成功变得有意义。 “足迹”提醒我所有我最爱的人，也是我自己，我在这里尽力而为，在这种“生活”中尽力而为，如果有任何有用的指导，任何人都可以从中获得它，那就是值得的。这就是使情况变得更糟，做对并做到。”

请参阅下面的完整播客：

; 1235917162 IheartMedia首席执行官鲍勃·皮特曼（Bob Pittman）购买了200,000股公司股票，价格上涨23％ https://www.billboard.com/pro/iheartmedia-ceo-buys-200000-shares-company-stock-price-jumps/Glenn Peoples Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:19:48 +0000 BusinessRadioiHeartMediaMusic Stocksstockshttps://www.billboard.com/?post_type = billboard_pro_post&p=1235917202 iHeartMedia shares had slipped nearly 28% since the company announced its fourth-quarter earnings on Feb. 27.

iHeartMedia CEO Bob Pittman apparently believes his company's stock is undervalued.

根据周四（3月6日）发布的一份SEC文件，高管于周二（3月4日）在周二（3月4日）向华尔街发送了一条消息。投资者注意到，将公司的股价上涨23.2％，至1.86美元。

有关的

无线电收入：iHeartMedia收入提高，库卢斯媒体收入在2024年略有下降

02/27/2025

iHeartMedia shares had plummeted 27.7% in the four trading days following the company's fourth quarter earnings release on Feb. 27. The stock fell 15.3% to $1.77 following the announcement and slipped an additional 14.8%, to $1.51, by Wednesday (March 5).但是周四的SEC申请将IheartMedia的年及时下降从23.7％降至6.1％。

首席执行官认为市场低估了公司时，偶尔会购买公司的股票。 In March 2020, Live Nation CEO Michael Rapino bought approximately $1 million worth of shares as the price faltered at the pandemic's onset; Live Nation的股价从那以后上涨了262％，至131.11美元。 In May 2022, Spotify CEO Daniel Ek bought $50 million of Spotify shares a week after the stock hit an all-time low of $95.74. “我相信我们最好的日子在前进，” EK当时在Twitter上写道。 Spotify的股价从那以后上涨了近六倍，达到543.51美元。

该国最大的广播电台IheartMedia试图在建立数字业务的同时导航广播广播的下降。尽管它在播客市场份额中排名第一，但该公司的传统业务仍然是其数字业务的两倍。 To shore up its financials, the company has laid off employees , sold tower sites and restructured its debt .

上周，IheartMedia高管告诉投资者，第一季度的收入将下降，而单位低，全年收入将是持平的。 CFO Rich Bressler said that January revenue was up 5.5% but February revenue was on track for a 7% decline as consumer sentiment suffered its biggest one-month decline since August 2021.

布雷斯勒说：“尽管这一年始于乐观，但许多公司现在关注潜在的关税，通货膨胀和更高的利率可能影响其业务，引入不确定性元素。”

皮特曼仍然乐观，并相信这些不确定性会随着一年的进展而“稳定很多”。他说：“如果有变化，人们会击败并适应变化。” “这个[总统]政府与最后一个政府之间有很大的变化，我认为人们正在消化。我认为不确定性是完全出乎意料的，这当然是可以理解的。”

; 1235917202 PRAS在联邦欺诈案中对特朗普总统对赦免的希望：“我希望他关注我” https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/pras-pras-pardon-donald-trump-tory-lanez-1235917120/Michael Saponara Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:17:35 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-HopLegalMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235917120 The Fugees rapper also called for Tory Lanez's freedom.

Prakazrel “Pras” Michel was found guilty in his 2023 federal fraud case, and he's looking for President Trump to grant him a pardon.

The Fugees rapper is accused of participating in multimillion-dollar political conspiracies that have spanned the last two presidencies.

有关的

面对数十年的监狱，Fugees的PrasMichél在定罪后的第一次采访中说：“永远不会……

11/27/2024

TMZ caught up with Pras earlier this week while riding around in his Lamborghini, and he looked to bring Trump's attention to his fraud case.

“我们正在赦免这不是秘密。我的团队，我们希望我们会占上风。”他说。 “当您谈论法律和选择性起诉时，[特朗普和我]可能会有共同点。最后一个司法部可能有些震惊。这就是我们的正义。您只需要相信这个过程。”

普拉斯继续向特朗普传达信息：“我们所能做的就是祝他一切顺利。我们都必须扮演我们的角色……显然，我希望他会注意我。尽管如此，但这只是60多天。”

检察官声称，普拉斯通过稻草捐助者向巴拉克·奥巴马（Barack Obama）的2012年竞选活动从马来西亚金融家那里汇款，并影响了特朗普政府期间涉及中国的引渡案件。

PRA在2023年因10项罪名被定罪，其中包括阴谋指控，证人篡改，隐瞒重大事实，而不是注册为外国权力的代理人。他面临长达22年的监禁，正在等待判决。

The 52-year-old also shined a spotlight on Tory Lanez's legal situation and called for the Canadian singer's freedom in his 2020 felony shooting case against Megan Thee Stallion . PRAS希望在未来看到加利福尼亚州州长Gavin Newsom Pardon Lanez。 “自由保守党兰尼斯，”他说。 Lanez was sentenced to 10 years behind bars in 2023.
